Frequently Asked Questions
How does the OpenAI ChatGPT API pricing calculator estimate the cost?
It is based on the total tokens processed, counting both inputs and outputs from the API. Each token processed contributes to your total bill.
Can I get OpenAI API for free?
While OpenAI provides a playground for experimentation, in-depth utilization of its API comes with a cost and is not available for free.
How many words are 1K tokens?
The conversion of tokens to words varies due to token length diversity. On an average, 1000 tokens are used for 750 English words.
How much does OpenAI cost per day?
Daily OpenAI cost is dependent on usage. It's calculated based on the total tokens processed via the API within that day.
How do I request an OpenAI API?
To request OpenAI API, visit the OpenAI website. Navigate to the API section and follow the outlined signup process and instructions.
